item.title: Tensorboard
item.description: 调用方法 1 import torch 2 from torch.autograd import Variable 3 from torch.utils.tensorboard import SummaryWriter 4 5 writer = SummaryWriter(comment="-test") 6 with writer: //保证writer调用完关掉 7 writer.method() 8 writer.export_scalars_to_json("./test.json") //把scalar信息保存到文件 add_scalar() 在一个图表中记录一
